configure.title: Configure daily summary
configure.description:
Configure the menu summary that will be displayed as calendar entries and sensor state. Switch between available dates and make sure everything looks good.

*Press submit/save to see changes.
*Check I'm done configuring when you are happy.

data.meals_selected: Meals found, select to filter (none = all, always)
data.prefer_label: Prefer dishes containing (only have effect if Max dishes is set)
data.max_entries: Max dishes to merge (0 or blank = unlimited)

error.invalid_lunch_interval: Lunch end time must be after lunch start time
error.menu_fetch_failed: Failed to fetch menu. Check URL, check logs.
error.processor_missing_fields: Provide both processor file and function name.
error.processor_file_missing: Processor file not found under processors/.
error.processor_import_failed: Processor module could not be loaded.
error.processor_fn_missing: Processor function not found or not callable.
